name: HURDLE
description: Execute key triggers and actions to initiate offensive flow, overcome defensive setups, and maintain advantage. Initiate offense and keep defense off-balance.

name: SPRINT
description: Maintain high tempo and intensity; advance the ball quickly with pace to create offensive opportunities. Commitment to relentless pace and quick transitions.

name: DISRUPT
description: Use disruptive defense to force the offense into a confined space and limit scoring opportunities. Disrupt rhythm and force opponents into low-quality shots.
